exchange.question: What can I do here?
exchange.answer: Need a touch-up? The Colorizer should still work fine.

exchange.question: What's the Colorizer?
exchange.answer: The Colorizer can change your hair and skin color - it's right over there.

character.statement: What's the difference between an angry circus owner and a Roman barber?
What's the surest sign that you need to find a new barber?
A Poptropican walks into a barbershop...
Come to get your ears lowered?
One is a raving showman, and the other is a shaving Roman!
The pile of swept-up ears in the corner!
Actually, I shouldn't tell you this one until you're older.
Got some new ideas for outfits? Give that lever a crank and let's see!
Mm? Just keep pulling the lever to see new combinations. Everything can mix and match!
Looking for a new outfit? Plenty to choose from up on the racks.
I wouldn't have thought of those together, I like your style!
I suppose it could work, in the right lighting...
Everything eventually comes back in fashion, I suppose.
